available.description: Indicates the availability status of the agent.

occasional.description: Indicates if the agent is an occasional contributor.

signature.description: Email signature used by the agent.

ticket_scope.description: Scope or access level of the agent for tickets.

created_at.description: Timestamp indicating when the agent account was created.

updated_at.description: Timestamp indicating when the agent information was last updated.

last_active_at.description: Timestamp indicating when the agent was last active.

available_since.description: Timestamp indicating when the agent became available.

type.description: Type or role of the agent within the support system.

active.description: Indicates if the contact is currently active.

job_title.description: Title or role of the contact within the organization.

last_login_at.description: Timestamp of the contact's last login.

mobile.description: Mobile phone number of the contact.

time_zone.description: Time zone setting for the contact.

created_at.description: Timestamp indicating when the contact was created.

updated_at.description: Timestamp indicating when the contact was last updated.
